displayCurrency.description: Currency you want amounts displayed in

conversionRateKey.description: API key for freecurrencyapi.com, used for uncommon currencies (avoids rate limiting)

donoWhitelist.description: If true, waits for donos to be approved on reader to display. If false, gives a 15s window to censor

blacklistWindowSec.description: Delay in displaying donation to give time to censor, in seconds
